channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Aspera Shares
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Aspera Shares

item.title: CVE-2020-4731|2024-09-17T02:47:25.376Z -- ibm -- aspera%20shares
item.description: IBM Aspera Web Application 1.9.14 PL1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 188055.

item.title: CVE-2024-38315|2024-09-16T15:16:30.485Z -- ibm -- aspera%20shares
item.description: IBM Aspera Shares 1.0 through 1.10.0 PL3 does not invalidate session after a password reset which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-38018|2024-08-09T16:25:10.609Z -- ibm -- aspera%20shares
item.description: IBM Aspera Shares 1.10.0 PL2 does not invalidate session after a password change which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 260574.

item.title: CVE-2023-38018|2024-08-09T21:35:43.415Z -- ibm -- aspera%20shares
item.description: IBM Aspera Shares 1.10.0 PL2 does not invalidate session after a password change which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 260574.
